Light travels faster than sound, which is the reason that some people appear bright before you hear them speak.

That's a humorous take on the old adage! It plays on the physical fact that light indeed travels faster than sound to create a witty remark about how people can make a good first impression visually, but then reveal less impressive traits when they begin to talk. It's always good to have a sense of humor about human interactions. If you have any more jokes or need information on a different topic, feel free to share!
